description: Ministers call for Didier Gailhaguet to resign after allegations that a coach raped an ice skater.
title: Sarah Abitbol: French ice skating head refuses to resign
title_page: Sarah Abitbol: French ice skating head refuses to resign - BBC News
maintext: The former skater, who is now 44, rejected Mr Beyer's apology and said that she wanted accountability for "all those who covered up [the crimes] both in the club and the federation".
